explains: vt. 收回；恢复；偿还；扣除
vi. 获得补偿；请求扣除

sentences.en: We hope to recoup our initial investment in the first year.
sentences.cn: 我们希望我们的前期投资在第一年就能赚回来。

sentences.en: Insurance companies are trying to recoup their losses by increasing premiums.
sentences.cn: 保险公司正试图通过增加保费来弥补损失。

sentences.en: They are trying to recoup themselves for their losses.
sentences.cn: 他们正在设法挽回他们的损失。
